verbs.description: President Trump ’s announcement Tuesday that the U.S. [V: will] withdraw from the Iran nuclear deal and reimpose economic sanctions in 90 days delivers a death blow to a deeply flawed agreement approved in 2015 by President Obama and representatives of other nations .

President Trump ’s announcement Tuesday that [ARG0: the U.S.] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: withdraw] [ARG2: from the Iran nuclear deal] and reimpose economic sanctions in 90 days delivers a death blow to a deeply flawed agreement approved in 2015 by President Obama and representatives of other nations .
